title: ERROR: JOIN buffer size exceeded maximum limit
description: JOIN operation buffer exceeded the configured maximum size limit
common_causes: Large result sets, insufficient buffer configuration, memory constraints
resolution: Increase buffer size limits, optimize query to reduce result set, add memory resources

title: WARNING: JOIN selectivity estimation highly inaccurate
description: Query planner's JOIN selectivity estimates are significantly off from actual values
common_causes: Outdated statistics, data skew, complex join predicates
resolution: Update table statistics with ANALYZE, increase statistics target, consider manual hints

title: ERROR: Nested loop JOIN depth limit exceeded
description: Nested loop JOIN operation exceeded maximum nesting depth
common_causes: Too many nested joins, recursive join patterns, query complexity
resolution: Restructure query to reduce nesting, use CTEs, optimize join order

title: NOTICE: Hash JOIN bucket distribution uneven
description: Hash JOIN showing uneven distribution across hash buckets
common_causes: Poor hash function performance, skewed data distribution, inadequate hash table size
resolution: Analyze data distribution, adjust hash table parameters, consider alternative join methods

title: ERROR: Sort-merge JOIN sort buffer overflow
description: Sort buffer overflow during sort-merge JOIN operation
common_causes: Large datasets requiring sorting, insufficient sort buffer, multiple concurrent sorts
resolution: Increase work_mem, optimize sort operations, consider pre-sorted data access

title: WARNING: JOIN condition function marked as volatile
description: Function used in JOIN condition is marked as volatile, preventing optimization
common_causes: Incorrect function volatility classification, optimization barriers
resolution: Review function volatility, mark as STABLE or IMMUTABLE if appropriate

title: ERROR: Cross JOIN result set memory allocation failed
description: Memory allocation failed for cross JOIN result set
common_causes: Cartesian product too large, insufficient memory, system resource limits
resolution: Add proper join conditions, increase memory limits, restructure query

title: NOTICE: Lateral JOIN correlation inefficient
description: Lateral JOIN correlation is inefficient for current data patterns
common_causes: Poor correlation selectivity, missing indexes on correlated columns
resolution: Add indexes on correlated columns, optimize lateral expressions

title: ERROR: Anti-join NOT IN with NULL values
description: Anti-join using NOT IN failed due to NULL values in the list
common_causes: NULL values in NOT IN subquery, incorrect null handling logic
resolution: Use NOT EXISTS instead of NOT IN, handle NULLs explicitly with IS NOT NULL

title: WARNING: Semi-join EXISTS subquery not optimized
description: EXISTS subquery in semi-join is not being optimized effectively
common_causes: Complex subquery structure, missing indexes, poor selectivity
resolution: Simplify subquery, add appropriate indexes, consider IN clause alternative

title: ERROR: Self-join alias conflict detected
description: Self-join operation has conflicting table aliases
common_causes: Duplicate alias names, ambiguous column references, query syntax errors
resolution: Use unique table aliases, qualify all column references, review query syntax

title: NOTICE: Natural JOIN column mismatch warning
description: Natural JOIN found unexpected column matches
common_causes: Schema changes, unintended column name matches, implicit join behavior
resolution: Use explicit JOIN conditions, avoid NATURAL JOIN, review schema design

title: ERROR: JOIN operation transaction isolation violation
description: JOIN operation violated transaction isolation level requirements
common_causes: Concurrent data modifications, inappropriate isolation level, phantom reads
resolution: Adjust isolation level, implement proper locking, coordinate concurrent access

title: WARNING: Partition-wise JOIN not enabled
description: Partition-wise JOIN optimization is not enabled for partitioned tables
common_causes: Configuration disabled, mismatched partition schemes, missing prerequisites
resolution: Enable partition-wise joins, align partition schemes, verify configuration

title: ERROR: JOIN condition data type conversion failed
description: Implicit data type conversion failed in JOIN condition
common_causes: Incompatible data types, conversion function missing, encoding issues
resolution: Cast data types explicitly, ensure compatible types, verify encoding

title: NOTICE: Parallel JOIN worker imbalance detected
description: Parallel JOIN execution showing worker load imbalance
common_causes: Uneven data distribution, poor partitioning, worker coordination issues
resolution: Improve data distribution, adjust parallel worker settings, optimize partitioning

title: ERROR: JOIN result materialization disk space full
description: Disk space exhausted during JOIN result materialization
common_causes: Large result sets, insufficient temp space, multiple concurrent operations
resolution: Increase temporary disk space, optimize result set size, coordinate operations

title: WARNING: JOIN plan cache invalidation frequent
description: JOIN query plans are being invalidated frequently
common_causes: Statistics changes, schema modifications, parameter sensitivity
resolution: Stabilize statistics, minimize schema changes, reduce parameter sensitivity

title: ERROR: Recursive JOIN infinite loop detected
description: Recursive JOIN operation entered infinite loop
common_causes: Missing termination condition, circular references, incorrect recursive logic
resolution: Add proper termination conditions, implement cycle detection, verify logic

title: NOTICE: JOIN index usage suboptimal
description: Available indexes are not being used optimally for JOIN operations
common_causes: Poor index selectivity, missing composite indexes, outdated statistics
resolution: Create appropriate indexes, update statistics, analyze join patterns

title: ERROR: Hash JOIN memory leak detected
description: Memory leak detected in hash JOIN implementation
common_causes: Software bug, resource cleanup failure, memory management issue
resolution: Report bug, restart connection, monitor memory usage, apply patches

title: WARNING: Sort-merge JOIN performance degraded
description: Sort-merge JOIN performance has degraded significantly
common_causes: Data growth, index degradation, system resource changes
resolution: Rebuild indexes, update statistics, optimize system resources

title: ERROR: JOIN condition expression too complex
description: JOIN condition expression is too complex for optimizer
common_causes: Complex expressions, nested functions, multiple conditions
resolution: Simplify join conditions, break into multiple steps, use intermediate results

title: NOTICE: Nested loop JOIN index scan inefficient
description: Index scan in nested loop JOIN is inefficient
common_causes: Poor index selectivity, large outer table, missing statistics
resolution: Improve index selectivity, update statistics, consider hash join

title: ERROR: JOIN operation checkpoint conflict
description: JOIN operation conflicted with database checkpoint
common_causes: Long-running join, checkpoint timing, resource contention
resolution: Optimize join duration, adjust checkpoint settings, coordinate timing

title: WARNING: Multi-table JOIN order suboptimal
description: Multi-table JOIN order chosen by planner is suboptimal
common_causes: Inaccurate cost estimates, missing statistics, complex join graph
resolution: Update statistics, consider join hints, restructure query

title: ERROR: JOIN buffer allocation fragmented
description: JOIN buffer allocation is highly fragmented
common_causes: Memory fragmentation, multiple concurrent joins, insufficient contiguous memory
resolution: Restart database, optimize memory allocation, reduce concurrent operations

title: NOTICE: Foreign key JOIN constraint missing
description: JOIN operation would benefit from foreign key constraint
common_causes: Missing referential integrity, optimization opportunities
resolution: Add foreign key constraints, verify data integrity, enable constraint-based optimization

title: ERROR: JOIN operation lock timeout exceeded
description: JOIN operation exceeded lock timeout waiting for resources
common_causes: Lock contention, long-running transactions, deadlock avoidance
resolution: Optimize transaction duration, adjust lock timeout, implement retry logic

title: WARNING: JOIN result set cardinality explosion
description: JOIN result set cardinality exploded beyond expected size
common_causes: Many-to-many relationships, missing join conditions, data quality issues
resolution: Review join logic, add proper conditions, implement data quality checks

title: ERROR: Lateral JOIN subquery correlation failed
description: Lateral JOIN subquery correlation failed during execution
common_causes: Invalid correlation references, scope issues, subquery complexity
resolution: Fix correlation references, simplify subquery, verify scope

title: NOTICE: JOIN algorithm selection inconsistent
description: JOIN algorithm selection is inconsistent across similar queries
common_causes: Borderline cost estimates, statistics variations, parameter sensitivity
resolution: Stabilize statistics, adjust cost parameters, consider explicit hints

title: ERROR: Hash JOIN hash table collision rate high
description: Hash JOIN experiencing high hash table collision rate
common_causes: Poor hash distribution, inadequate hash table size, skewed data
resolution: Analyze data distribution, increase hash table size, consider alternative algorithms

title: WARNING: JOIN condition null handling inconsistent
description: NULL value handling in JOIN conditions is inconsistent
common_causes: Mixed null handling approaches, three-valued logic confusion
resolution: Standardize null handling, use explicit null checks, document behavior

title: ERROR: Sort-merge JOIN sort order conflict
description: Sort order conflict in sort-merge JOIN operation
common_causes: Conflicting sort requirements, collation differences, index ordering
resolution: Align sort orders, standardize collations, create appropriate indexes

title: NOTICE: Cross JOIN performance warning issued
description: Cross JOIN operation may cause performance issues
common_causes: Unintended Cartesian product, missing join conditions
resolution: Add proper join conditions, verify query logic, consider alternatives

title: ERROR: JOIN operation memory pressure detected
description: High memory pressure detected during JOIN operations
common_causes: Multiple concurrent joins, large datasets, insufficient memory
resolution: Increase available memory, optimize join timing, reduce concurrency

title: WARNING: Natural JOIN schema dependency risk
description: Natural JOIN creates risky dependency on schema structure
common_causes: Implicit column matching, schema evolution risks
resolution: Replace with explicit joins, document dependencies, implement schema controls

title: ERROR: Self-join recursive depth exceeded
description: Self-join recursive operation exceeded maximum depth
common_causes: Deep hierarchical data, missing termination, infinite recursion
resolution: Implement depth limits, add termination conditions, use recursive CTEs

title: NOTICE: Anti-join performance optimization available
description: Anti-join operation could be optimized for better performance

resolution: Optimize NOT EXISTS queries, add appropriate indexes, consider alternatives

title: ERROR: JOIN condition function execution failed
description: Function execution failed in JOIN condition

resolution: Debug function logic, validate parameters, handle exceptions

title: WARNING: Semi-join IN clause performance poor

resolution: Use EXISTS instead of IN, add indexes, optimize subquery

title: ERROR: Nested loop JOIN index lookup failed

title: NOTICE: Hash JOIN build phase inefficient

title: ERROR: JOIN operation WAL generation excessive

title: WARNING: Sort-merge JOIN merge phase slow
